genresAdvancedInfo.name: acousmatic
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A type of electroacoustic music that is created by manipulating and processing recorded sounds. The term "acousmatic" refers to the separation of the sound from its source, making it difficult to identify the original source of the sound. Acousmatic music is often abstract and experimental, exploring the possibilities of sound manipulation and spatialization.
